textos_fuente.text: Discover Unique Venues for Special Occasions: Farm of Dreams Resort — Farm of Dreams Resort 0 Skip to Content Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story Folder: About Back Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Host Unforgettable Events at Farm of Dreams Resort Discover the perfect venues for your special occasions at Farm of Dreams Resort. We offer two exceptional buildings ready to host small events, gatherings, or intimate weddings. The Activity Center: Our first venue is a charming screened-in pavilion spanning approximately 1,500 square feet. It features a beautiful working fireplace, wood high-top tables, a conventional couch area, a bar service, a spacious 500-square-foot commercial kitchen, and convenient bathroom facilities. This versatile space is perfect for a variety of events, whether it's a family reunion, a birthday celebration, or an intimate wedding. The Reception Hall: Our second venue is a spacious 2,000-square-foot activity center, built with 180-degree glass windows to view nature’s natural beauty, complete with modern bathroom facilities. Inside, you'll find two additional rooms, perfect for a Bride and Groom to prepare and relax before their special day. This center provides an elegant backdrop for events that require a touch of sophistication. Flexible Event Hosting: We understand the importance of flexibility in event planning. Special events can take place concurrently with RV site rentals. If it's a community event and you have guests already staying here, no extra charges will be added. We believe in creating a seamless and enjoyable experience for all our guests. Other Available Rentals: In addition to the above rentals, we also have a large smoker and grill area, and golf carts available to rent at the office during your stay. At Farm of Dreams Resort, we're here to turn your events into unforgettable memories. Click the button below to inquire about availability and start planning your next gathering in the heart of nature. Farm Of Dreams Resort - Brooksville, Florida - Campspot see all results for Brooksville, FL Farm Of Dreams Resort Brooksville,
            FL 5.0 - - 6 Verified Reviews Save View 12
          Photos About Nestled within 120 acres of picturesque landscapes in Brooksville, FL, Farm of Dreams Resort emerges as a serene haven for nature enthusiasts and RV travelers alike. Boasting an intimate setting with only 15 RV sites, the resort distinguishes itself as a premier agritourism destination, seamlessly blending the tranquility of nature with recreational opportunities. The property beckons visitors to explore its enchanting surroundings through 5 miles of winding walking trails nestled within the woods, providing a perfect escape for those seeking serenity and connection with the outdoors. Additionally, the resort caters to active guests with pickleball facilities, encouraging friendly competition and outdoor camaraderie. At Farm of Dreams Resort, guests are invited to unwind in the embrace of nature, where the allure of agritourism meets the comforts of RV living for a truly idyllic escape. April 2025 5/5 - Satisfaction Rating We have stayed at 25+ campgrounds in the past year alone. This is a top 3 easily. The team is beyond hospitable, and the spaces are all perfectly laid out, large and level. The resort has plenty to do for everyone, with a nice pool, fishing dock, golf cart rentals, miles of trails and more. The kids loved feeding the goats and cows. Would recommend to anyone if you want to disconnect! Staff 5 /5 Cellular 5 /5 Wifi n/a Value 5 /5 Site 5 /5 Location 5 /5 Washrooms 5 /5 Amenities 5 /5 Todd L. Farm of Dreams Resort 0 Skip to Content Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story Folder: About Back Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book A resort campground offering a unique camping experience. Fully equipped cabins, full-hook-up RV sites, and event space. We offer nightly and short-term stays. Sorry, no long-term. Call to book our reception hall or activity center for your next special event. Book Campsites & Cottages Set on 120 acres in beautiful Hernando County,  Brooksville, FL. The resort was thoughtfully built for travelers with a love for the great outdoors. Come visit our hidden gem. Lakeview Cabins Ideal for small families or couples, our cabins sleep up to 6 guests. Find yourself surrounded by Florida’s most beautiful natural features with adventures at every corner. RV Sites All RV Sites are equipped with a cement pad, 20-amp, 30-amp and 50-amp electricity hookups, water, sewer, picnic table, fire ring, charcoal grill, and wi-fi. (More photos coming soon) The Farm of Dreams Resort was created by the Matthews Family The resort was created by our family for your family and friends to enjoy right along with us. We are thankful for your support and hope to see you and your family soon! Learn more Location 10 minutes from Downtown Brooksville • 40 minutes from Tampa 30 minutes from Weeki Wachee River • 15 minutes from I-75 Experience the extraordinary at Farm of Dreams Resort, where Central Florida's natural beauty and warm hospitality meet to create unforgettable memories. What sets Farm of Dreams Resort apart is our 120-acre oasis, adorned with majestic trees and abundant nature. With just 15 RV sites and 4 cabins, you'll enjoy a serene escape with a beautiful lake and frequent wildlife sightings, including deer, turkeys, hawks, and more. Adventure and paradise awaits. Learn more Location 2248 Culbreath Road Brooksville, Florida 34602 Contact info@farmofdreamsresort.com 352-806-3444 Website made with love by Roots Creative Co.

About Us Menu Close Home WORKS Capabilities Marketing & Advertising Strategy Branding & Design Storytelling Brand Mascot Digital Marketing Content, Social Media & Influence Marketing Game Metaverse & NFT 3D Configurator Paid Ads Video Production Virtual Influencer Neorix.ai Blog About Us Contact us Home About us WE ARE Dream farm agency Vision Our vision is to combine Marketing, Art, and Technology expertise, to create previously unimagined brand experiences, and offer forward-thinking strategies that improve brands’ marketing efforts. With our artistic backbone, technology knowledge, and a great focus on areas often overlooked by traditional 360 agencies, we are aiming to fill a void in the industry, providing flexible, up-to-date solutions for today’s incredibly fast-changing tech landscape. Testimonial Lyra GU Brand Manager @ Sungrow Collaborating with Dream Farm Agency is absolute pleasure. The team truly understood our vision and brought the characters to life in ways that felt fresh yet authentic to our brand. Dream Farm delivered beyond our expectations, and we’re thrilled with the results. Thank you for your fantastic work! Celia Herrera Creative Producer @ Mozilla Firefox It was a pleasure to work with the very talented team at Dream Farm Studios. They helped us define the needs for a brand character and completed milestones for the project with openness, skill, and flexibility in response to our complex feedback. Our team would love to have the chance to work with them again. Mark Makhlouf Director, Creative Communication @ FGS Global Namour's animation played a vital role in engaging and informing school visitors during the SGI Gallery, highlighting Namour's physical presence on the ground. The animation brought the character to life, providing an interactive and educational experience for students and attendees.

DFA helped translate FGS Global's vision into a creative and dynamic animation, incorporating educational elements that aligned with the objectives of Namour and SGI targets. DFA's contributions supported increased social interaction, visibility, and audience engagement, making the experience both impactful and memorable for visitors. Isaiah Mac Jerry Co-founder and CEO @ Clever Daycare Our journey with the Dream Farm Agency team has been enjoyable and worthwhile! Their friendly, collaborative approach made the process smooth from the very beginning.  Our new Brand identity, crafted with their expertise, perfectly mirrors our proficient and caring personality, helping us to connect more deeply with our community. Jobst Eggert Team lead Networking Relations @ PETA Dream Farm did a fantastic job. The result was perfect, showing the professional work and effort they put into the project. They were highly focused on taking care of our needs, and satisfy us as a customer. As this project was about animal rights, Dream Farm really helped us spread such valuable message effectively. Karen Brady Marketing Director @ Bradys The Dream Farm Studio team listened to our vision for a branded Brady’s Drug Store pharmacy character and then brought it to life. We appreciated their willingness to take a creative journey together. It was a collaborative process that brought together our brand promise and their skill at animation and we are very pleased with the results. Nicole LaSpina Senior Director, Brand Marketing @ Wyndham Partnering with Dream Farm Agency exceeded our expectations. Not only was the quality of work fantastic, but they were very collaborative and were able to deliver under an expedited time frame. Their team is friendly, professional, and made the process seamless. Claude Brooks Co-creator @ Doggyland Dream Farm consistently delivers quality animation. They have great attention to detail and contribute innovative ideas during the creative process, pulled from their years of experience. Their character and world designs are unique, bringing distinct flavor to every video they make. Ridge Kiley Co-Founder/ CEO @ Rising Empire Studios Dream Farm's quality of work was exceptional. They hit every milestone and exceeded our expectations. For Alpha Clash, Dream Farm will be our first choice for all future projects. Discover the Inspiring Journey Behind Farm of Dreams Resort — Farm of Dreams Resort 0 Skip to Content Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story Folder: About Back Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Our Story When we first bought this property and noticed the reaction of all of our guests, we really felt led by the spirit of God to open it to the public and share this property with others. We initially purchased this property without a clear plan. We named our farm, Farm of Dreams with inspiration from the phrase from the movie Field of Dreams. “If you build it, they will come.” At the time I wasn’t really sure of who we were referring to, but the more friends and family that came out to our property, the more the vision became clear that we were supposed to share the glory of this property with others. This was the first property we looked at and the others just didn’t measure up to the beauty of this property. Developing the property has been a long process– it took 4 years just to get things approved. We are delighted with how the resort has come together. It started with people and friends who wanted to stay here. Our family has camped most of our life and we hold many great memories as a family camping. We wanted to create a positive place where people can come together and enjoy friendship, family, and all of God’s glory. We prayed about it and we were guided to open our property to the public for camping and special events. We have combined nature with recreation and were determined to develop this property as an Agrotourism destination where one can unplug from the real world and be reminded of what life is all about. This is what we hope Farm of Dreams is for you. The real magic of the property is its uniqueness and ability to make you feel at home as you drive up the trail for the first time. Our goal was to take the acreage and turn it into a place where others can create countless, dear memories on its grounds, just as we have over the years. Our sincerest desire is that you and your loved ones can do the same. We hope to see you soon. - The Matthews Family View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize Location 2248 Culbreath Road Brooksville, Florida 34602 Contact info@farmofdreamsresort.com 352-806-3444 Website made with love by Roots Creative Co.

The staff is kind and always available to help (for example they provided us with a phon and helped with the luggages).  The room was clean as any place in the lodge.  During the evening we spent there was a small exhibition from local artists with music, dance and acrobatics.  I am rewarding 4 stars and not 5 because: - the breakfast was very american oriented  - the buffet dinner food quality and variety were lacking - the dining tables were not cleaned properly after previous guests used them M‍a‍t‍t‍h‍e‍w‍ ‍P June 16, 2025 The accomodation was great, comfortable bed and amenities were good. They GET hospitality. The staff are welcoming, attentive, kind, and all smiles. Nothing is too much trouble. Beautiful grounds. Great room and bedding. Excellent spa and massage! Great pool but a bit cold for my blood. Discover Our Cozy Cabins | Farm of Dreams Resort — Farm of Dreams Resort 0 Skip to Content Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story About Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Open Menu Close Menu Our Story Folder: About Back Frequently Asked Questions Campground Rules Farm of Dreams Resort Map Farm of Dreams Waiver Cabins RV Sites Amenities Special Events Local Guide Contact Blog Book Spacious Cabins Farm of Dreams Resort offers cozy cottage rentals with beautiful lake views. The cottages are nestled in this picturesque landscape, providing a perfect escape into nature. They feature comfortable amenities and a peaceful atmosphere. You can enjoy the tranquility of the farm while taking in gorgeous views! Cabin Booking Each cottage sleeps four to six guests. Additional cost after the 4th guest. We have designed the cottages to feel ideal for a group of four adults, a small family, or a couple. Renting multiple cottages is a fantastic option for larger groups. Four distinctive lakeview cottages are available One one-bedroom ADA-accessible cottage designed for developmentally disabled guests, including a large loft Three two-bedroom cottages, including a small loft with around 700 square feet of space Modern amenities, including fully equipped kitchens, washer and dryer, and heating/cooling Complete access to all of our resort amenities , including our pool, lake dock, fishing, cornhole, horseshoes, hiking, a fort, and more throughout the property Access to a common area with a large fire pit to gather around, perfect for viewing the sunset over the lake Comfortable and fully furnished cabins Decks and porches are planned for outdoor relaxation Select pet-friendly cottages with a nominal pet charge, with a dog park on-site. Please, no pets in the pool area. Complimentary linens and towels are provided for your convenience Convenient online booking process with personalized on-site assistance Please check out our frequently asked questions and campground rules for more info Cabin Booking Location 2248 Culbreath Road Brooksville, Florida 34602 Contact info@farmofdreamsresort.com 352-806-3444 Website made with love by Roots Creative Co.
